question: The theme of World Cancer Day for 2016-2018 period is __________.
explanation: World Cancer Day is observed every year on 4th February. The World Cancer Day was founded by the Union for International Cancer Control (UICC) in the idea of supporting the goals of World Cancer Declaration that was written in 2008. The theme for World Cancer Day for 2016-2018 period is: 'We Can. I can'. On the World Cancer Day people are expected to contribute towards reducing the impact of cancer worldwide.
